liste.punkt: You are applying for The Norwegian Labor Inspection Authority's form "relocation / facilitation due to pregnancy" (no. 474 b).
The doctor or midwife fills out his part of the form. The form takes you to your employer.
If your employer is unable to relocate you or give you other duties, the employer must complete their part of the form before sending it to NAV together with one frontpage
